fts_total_queries.help: The number of full text queries per second for an index

fts_total_internal_queries.help: The number of internal queries from the co-ordinating node to other nodes, per unit time for an index

fts_num_mutations_to_index.help: DCP sequence numbers yet to be indexed for an index

fts_doc_count.help: Number of documents in the index

fts_total_bytes_indexed.help: Rate of bytes indexed for an index

fts_total_request_time.help: Total time spent processing query requests for an index

fts_num_recs_to_persist.help: The number of entries (terms, records, dictionary rows, etc) by Bleve not yet persisted to storage

fts_num_bytes_used_disk.help: The number of bytes used on disk by the index

fts_num_bytes_used_disk_by_root.help: The number of bytes used on disk by the root segment

fts_num_root_memorysegments.help: The number of memory segments in the root segment

fts_num_root_filesegments.help: The number of file segments in the root segment

fts_total_compaction_written_bytes.help: Number of bytes written to disk as a result of compaction

fts_avg_queries_latency.help: Average latency of queries per unit time for an index

fts_avg_internal_queries_latency.help: Average latency of inter-node queries per unit time for an index

fts_total_queries_slow.help: The number of FTS queries in the slow query log

fts_total_queries_timeout.help: The number of FTS queries for an index that exceeded the timeout

fts_total_queries_error.help: The number of FTS queries for an index that resulted in an error

fts_total_bytes_query_results.help: Size of results coming back from full text queries for search results, including the entire size of the JSON sent

fts_total_term_searchers.notes: This is a bleve level statistic. Each query will require one or more term searchers to be satisfied, with more complex queries typically requiring more term searchers. This value is therefore a additional way to look at query load that approximates how complex a "query" is (query may break down to many different term searchers)

fts_total_term_searchers_finished.help: Total term searchers that have finished serving a query

fts_num_files_on_disk.help: The number of files on disk for an index

fts_num_bytes_used_ram.help: The number of bytes used in memory
fts_num_bytes_used_ram.notes: Process level statistic from the Go runtime

fts_total_gc.help: The number of garbage collection events triggered
fts_total_gc.notes: Process level statistic from the Go runtime

fts_pct_cpu_gc.help: The percentage of CPU time spent by an index in garbage collection
fts_pct_cpu_gc.notes: Process level statistic from the Go runtime

fts_total_grpc_internal_queries.help: The number of internal gRPC requests from the co-ordinating node for the query to other nodes, for an index

fts_total_grpc_queries.help: The total number of queries, using gRPC for streaming, for an index

fts_total_grpc_queries_slow.help: The number of queries in the slow query log, using gRPC for streaming, for an index

fts_total_grpc_queries_timeout.help: The number of queries that exceeded the timeout, using gRPC for streaming, for an index

fts_avg_grpc_queries_latency.help: Average latency per query, using gRPC for streaming, for an index

fts_total_grpc_queries_error.help: The number of queries that resulted in an error, using gRPC for streaming, for an index

fts_tot_bleve_dest_opened.help: The number of times Bleve destinations opened
fts_tot_bleve_dest_opened.notes: Each Bleve destination corresponds to a Bleve index.

fts_total_queries_rejected_by_herder.help: The number of queries rejected by the app herder when the memory used exceeds the application's query quota

fts_curr_batches_blocked_by_herder.help: The difference between the number of batches that have been indexed and the number of batches yet to be indexed
fts_curr_batches_blocked_by_herder.notes: The app herder blocks indexing of batches till there is sufficient memory i.e. the memory used is below the memory quota

fts_tot_queryreject_on_memquota.help: Total number of queries rejected due to the memory quota being lesser than the estimated memory required for merging search results from all partitions from the query

fts_tot_grpc_queryreject_on_memquota.help: Total number of gRPC queries rejected due to the memory quota being lesser than the estimated memory required for merging search results from all partitions from the query

fts_batch_bytes_added.help: Total number of bytes from batches yet to be indexed.

fts_num_batches_introduced.help: Total number of batches introduced as part of indexing.

fts_tot_grpcs_listeners_closed.help: Total number of gRPC SSL listeners closed

fts_tot_remote_http.help: Total number of remote(i.e. different node) HTTP requests

fts_tot_remote_http2.help: Total number of remote(i.e. different node) HTTP SSL requests

fts_tot_batches_flushed_on_maxops.help: Total number of batches executed due to the batch size being greater than the maximum number of operations per batch

fts_tot_batches_flushed_on_timer.help: Total number of batches executed at regular intervals

fts_tot_bleve_dest_closed.help: Total number of times Bleve destinations closed

fts_tot_remote_grpc.help: Total number of remote(i.e. different node) gRPC requests

fts_tot_remote_grpc_tls.help: Total number of remote(i.e. different node) gRPC SSL requests when adding clients.

fts_batch_bytes_removed.help: Total number of bytes from batches which have been indexed.
fts_batch_bytes_removed.notes: This stat is associated with the fts_batch_bytes_added stat, in that they represent the completion and queuing of an indexing operation respectively.

fts_tot_grpc_listeners_opened.help: Total number of gRPC listeners opened

fts_tot_grpc_listeners_closed.help: Total number of gRPC listeners closed

fts_tot_grpcs_listeners_opened.help: Total number of gRPC SSL listeners opened

fts_tot_http_limitlisteners_closed.help: Total number of HTTP limit listeners closed

fts_tot_https_limitlisteners_closed.help: Total number of HTTPS limit listeners closed

fts_tot_https_limitlisteners_opened.help: Total number of HTTPS limit listeners opened

fts_tot_http_limitlisteners_opened.help: Total number of HTTP limit listeners opened
